name: Suburban Scum - Internal War *LIME, BLUE, BLACK + TEST PRESS* Package
description:
This is limited to 3 packages

All 3 colors, an original copy of Internal War on CD, 2 RTF Shirts ( Please add note of Size you are), some random RTF goodies plus a Personalized Test Press of the Internal War LP

This is a one sided LP by Suburban Scum of their first release Internal War. There are 100 Fluorescent Lime, 100 Transparent Blue and 300 Black Records. This is a PRE-ORDER and the release date for this will be THIS IS HARDCORE the 2nd week of August. It will ship after the band plays the fest on Thursday and will be available on their Japanese tour. 

Track Listing:

1. Count My Blessings
2. Dead End Path
3. Self Loathing
4. Internal War
5. Hollow Bones
6. Blind To Life
7. Suburban Discipline

name: RTF WRESTLING 3 : D! ADVANCE TICKETS
description:
We're back! RTF Wrestling hits you with our third show RTF 3: D! at the Warehouse Motorclub November 23rd 

Featuring: 

Pellinore ( Freecake All-stars )
http://freecake.bandcamp.com/album/world-darkness

Anti-Venom ( Mass crew RTF PFC )
http://antivenom.bandcamp.com/

Not the Bees! (NJ gritty pop punk rock n roll)
http://notthebeesnj.bandcamp.com/

and OF COURSE! The finest pro wrestling RTF has to offer with 5 Action packed matches!

"THE COLD HEARTED PLAYA" DANNY DEMANTO vs "RAW POWER" CHRIS POWERS
- "THANKSKILLING DEATH MATCH" Take violence you've grown to know from RTF and Thanksgiving and smash it together. What does that mean? Come to the show to find out! Demanto was not happy that Powers stole the show at RTF 2, Nov 23 he will attempt to dethrone the new RTF favorite. 

RIGHT TO PARTY vs BLACK HOLLYWOOD
- RTP has made waves in the first two RTF events and are coming back for more against Black Hollywood who is making their RTF Debut. Must see tag team action!

2 HOT STEVE SCOTT vs "THE MASSHOLE" MIKE MCCARTHY
- Steve Scott has quickly become known as RTF's resident douchebag and is currently riding high off a cheap win from RTF 2. However, the RTF debut of Boston's own, Mike McCarthy, is something the NJ punks have been asking for and McCarthy is not one to disappoint. 

2 RUDE DUDES w/ MIKE MANNING vs JEFF CANNONBALL/???

- 2 Rude Dudes have been instrumental in Manning's crusade against RTF and Jeff Cannonball. at "D!" they will happily attempt to finally put Cannonball out of action. Unfortunately, after the brutal matches Cannonball has been thrust into against members of the Manning family has turned off many from joining him. We find out who is crazy enough to join at RTF 3: D!

KYLE THE BEAST vs "MR. ENTERTAINMENT" JD SMOOTH
- Kyle The Beast with handler and double popped collar douchebag, Mike Manning has been a seemingly unstoppable threat to RTF. JD Smooth remains winless (and hated). JD wants to make an impression and so he sets his sights on Kyle. Not because he wants to help RTF...he is just Mr. Entertainment and he wants to shine. 

+ much more to be announced

Tickets will be $10 advanced and $12 day of

THIS SHOW MAY BE UNSUITABLE FOR CHILDREN, THERE WILL BE BLOOD, CURSING AN"D VIOLENCE.

name: DEACON- ROTTEN WORLD CDS / TAPES

Rotten World has 4 tracks from this Japanese unit and you won't be disappointed. There is a limited quantity of these so act fast!

name: RTF PRO WRESTLING TICKETS JULY 20TH
description:
RTF PRO WRESTLING
JULY 20th 2013 @ The Warehouse Motorclub
620 Lincoln Blvd, Middlesex NJ 
3pm BBQ
7pm SHOW

$10 Advanced $12 DOS
WILL CALL ONLY

THIS SHOW IS NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 16
THERE WILL BE BLOOD, CURSING AND THINGS THAT LITTLE KIDS MIGHT GET SCARED BY


Full Wrestling Card:
Jeff Cannonball vs Danny Demanto (thumbtack death match)
Joey Janela vs Chris Powers vs Too Hot Steve Scott
Kyle the Beast vs Myke Quest
2 Rude Dudes vs Mike Dennis & Nicky Oceans
JD Smooth lays out an open challenge

NOTE: ALTHOUGH THE UNDERTAKER IS ON THE FLYER, WE ARE NOT ADVERTISING HIM TO BE THERE... IT'S JUST A COOL PICTURE SO COOL IT NERDS OBVIOUSLY HE WON'T BE THERE

MUSIC BY:
OLD WOUNDS ( NJ Glory Kid Records )
DRAIZE ( Mass punx )
DAMAGED GOODS ( NJ Kids )

RESPECT THE VENUE, NO DRINKING, NO DRUGS, NO BULLSHIT

name: Troublemaker "Moratorium" LP
description:
This is the preorder for the "Moratorium" LP featuring 13 new songs by NJ's TROUBLEMAKER. There are 300 records total and the breakdown is as follows

50 Black Records only available on the TM Record Release Weekend
100 Clear/Black Swirl
150 Gold

The Clear/Black Swirl and the Grey will be the only colors available for preorder. There were also only be 50 of each color available for preorder and the rest will be available through the band / distro / record stores etc. 

DUE TO THE LIMITED AMOUNT OF VINYL WE ARE GETTING THIS WILL BE THE ONLY TIME THE RECORD WILL BE AVAILABLE THROUGH THE BIGCARTEL.  Otherwise the only way to get it will be through record stores / distros / the bands shows / RTF Shows and in person.

This record won't be shipped out til late September / Early October but in the mean time if you do preorder you will be sent a surprise RTF release (Troublemaker related) in the mail in late Early September. 

If you order both records you will not be charged extra shipping unless you live outside of the United States.

name: Too Many Voices- Demo 2011 SOLD OUT
description:
Andrew West (Kill Your Idols) and Eric Svirida(The Last Crime) started assembling the line-up that would eventually become Too Many Voices in mid-2010. They added guitarist, Ivan Gonzalez(25 ta Life), Scott Winegard(Texas Is the Reason/Fountainhead) on bass, and in early, 2011, the line-up was solidified with the addition of Chris Daly(TITR/108/Jets To Brazil) on drums.

Limited to 100 tapes

50 available from the Band
50 available from the label

One Time Pressing

Ships 10.25.11

description: Whats up guys, Staring Problem is set to release their final work at their last release show on cassette on RTF Records. The last show is Oct. 23rd @ The Asbury Lanes in NB w/ Fleshtemple, Guilt Trip, Hellhole, Sick Fuck and Night Birds. At this show the Pissed Human Dick 7 inch which was supposed to come out on Indecision records will be released on cassette by RTF Records. It is limited to 100 and the only way to get it is through the internet or at the show

name: Product of Waste / P.O.W Camp CASSETTE *SOLD OUT*
description:
This tape is a split cassette between Product of Waste and P.O.W Camp which is Terry's Hip Hop Project. Side A features P.O.W's Prophecies of a Poor man ( 5 Songs ) and Side B features 9 New songs by P.O.W Camp.

There are 100 White Cassettes and 100 Red Cassettes and they are $5PPD. The only way to get them is from Pre-ordering them or getting them at the record release gig where you will receive one with admission to the show. The band will have some too when they're out on their west coast tour for Sound and Fury.

There are only 50 pre-orders available 25 of each color so get em while you can.

name: Night Birds- SOLD OUT
description:
There will be 50 cassettes available for pre-order and the other 50 will be available through the band at their shows. This will only be limited to 100.

For those who don't know or haven't heard about NIGHT BIRDS. It features ex-members of THE ERGS, FOR SCIENCE, FORWARD TO DEATH and HUNCHBACK. They've been a band for little under a year now and are very 80's punk influenced. If you're into bands like the ADOLESCENTS, AGENT ORANGE, and THE DEAD KENNEDY'S you won't be disappointed.

name: Fleshtemple- SOLD OUT
description:
4 New songs from New Jersey's Fleshtemple. If you take Deadguy and Born Against and filter that sound through early 90's Black Metal you've got Fleshtemple. Bang your head and order a tape. Check out 2 of the new songs at http://www.myspace.com/fleshtemplenj


This cassette is limited to 100 copies. If you do not live in NJ or plan on attending the tape release show, pre-ordering this cassette is the only way you are going to be able to obtain it. Whatever is left over from pre-orders will be given out with admission to their release show next month.
